tech_news.title: Netflix Won’t Let You Cast Shows From Your Phone to Your TV Anymore - WIRED
tech_news.description: The streaming giant quietly removed the feature that lets you control content on your TV screen using a mobile device. The company says the feature was not widely used.

tech_news.description: From the time Brownlee launched Panels in September 2024, the app struggled to find an audience of its own. "We knew it was niche … and ultimately, we weren't able to turn it into the vision I had," Marques Brownlee said.
